description: This version of our iconic Bayport is crafted from lightweight cotton chambray that is dyed with indigo and washed.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27" front body length, a 26½" back body length, a 20¾" shoulder, a 47" chest, and a 36" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Point collar. Buttoned throat tab. Full-zip front.
Two front waist angled pockets. Elasticized hem. Unlined.
Multicolored signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
Shell and lining: 100% cotton. Sleeve lining: 100% recycled nylon. Machine washable. Imported.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Dyed with indigo, which may rub off onto fabrics, leather, and upholstery.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
